Simply manipulating dreams without addressing these deeper issues may not provide a long-term solution.

By addressing the underlying factors contributing to nightmares, we can work towards achieving better overall rest and well-being without necessarily needing to manipulate our dreams.

In conclusion, while your reason of better rest through controlling nightmares is valid, I disagree with the claim that we should manipulate our dreams. It is important to consider the potential drawbacks and limitations of dream manipulation and explore alternative approaches for dealing with nightmares.
